text: The corrupt bureaucrats are stealing from hardworking citizens.
label: Loaded_language

text: That idiotic proposal will destroy the economy.
label: Loaded_language

text: Coronavirus emergency is ’Public Enemy Number 1’.
label: Name_Calling,Labeling

text: Only a fool would believe that climate change isn't real.
label: Name_Calling,Labeling

text: War, war, war — that’s all they ever want.
label: Repetition

text: Freedom is what we fight for. Freedom is what we live for. Freedom defines us.
label: Repetition

text: Coronavirus ‘risk to the American people remains very low’, Trump said.
label: Exaggeration,Minimisation

text: This is just a minor hiccup — the economy is stronger than ever.
label: Exaggeration,Minimisation

text: Can the same be said for the Obama Administration?
label: Doubt

text: Do we really know what their true intentions are?
label: Doubt

text: If we don’t increase the defense budget, we’ll be invaded.
label: Appeal_to_fear-prejudice

text: Without this vaccine, your family is at serious risk.
label: Appeal_to_fear-prejudice

text: Mueller attempts to stop the will of We the People!!! It’s time to jail Mueller.
label: Flag-Waving

text: Support our troops by standing against those who criticize our nation’s values.
label: Flag-Waving

text: If France had not have declared war on Germany then World War II would have never happened.
label: Causal_Oversimplification

text: Crime rates are high simply because kids play too many video games.
label: Causal_Oversimplification

text: “BUILD THE WALL!” Trump tweeted.
label: Slogans

text: Yes We Can!
label: Slogans

text: Monsignor Jean-François Lantheaume, who served as first Counsellor of the Nunciature in Washington, confirmed that 'Viganò said the truth. That’s all.'
label: Appeal_to_Authority

text: According to Dr. James Peterson, a Nobel Prize-winning scientist, this supplement will improve brain function by 70%.
label: Appeal_to_Authority

text: Francis said these words: “Everyone is guilty for the good he could have done and did not do . . . If we do not oppose evil, we tacitly feed it.”
label: Black-and-White_Fallacy

text: If you're not with us, then you're definitely against us.
label: Black-and-White_Fallacy

text: I do not really see any problems there. Marx is the President.
label: Thought-terminating_Cliches

text: It is what it is, so let's just move on.
label: Thought-terminating_Cliches

text: President Trump —who himself avoided national military service in the 1960’s— keeps beating the war drums over North Korea.
label: Whataboutism,Straw_Men,Red_Herring

text: “Take it seriously, but with a large grain of salt.” Which is just Allen’s more nuanced way of saying: “Don’t believe it.”
label: Whataboutism,Straw_Men,Red_Herring

text: He tweeted, “EU no longer considers #Hamas a terrorist group. Time for US to do same.”
label: Bandwagon,Reductio_ad_hitlerum

text: “Vichy journalism,” a term which now fits so much of the mainstream media. It collaborates in the same way that the Vichy government in France collaborated with the Nazis.
label: Bandwagon,Reductio_ad_hitlerum
